sentence.text: This is the best game of all time
Really fun and awesome
I got the update and it turns off when it lods

This update is plain bad. It's one thing to make the levels challenging but to make them near impossible with no real reward, well, that misses the point entirely. I didn't finish Bad Piggies and won't be finishing this either.
I love the angry birds collection and have them all, except for angry piggies which I will buy later
It said there is a new pink bird in the birthday level but I have not seen it
Needs a restore purchase button. Bought the eagle awhile ago and now can't get it back.
Awesome game! Addicting and fun. Where's the last level? Still five stars!!! Well worth the price.
Fun
looks bad on iphone 5 its stretched
I wasn't even able to load the first level before crashing. Brilliant.

I have to agree with many other reviewers. The new levels are awful, and completely away from the traditional "Angry Birds" gameplay. It's more of a frustration, than enjoyment. You will end up with panic disorder, racing to get the egg away from the bad piggies, in their impossible to destroy contraptions and an impossible to control bird!!!
I get that they want to "spice" up the game a bit. But, that is what they made the other Angry Birds Games for! What they should have done, was create a whole different game for these new kinds of gameplay.
Hopefully, it is beyond clear to them, that not too many people enjoy these new levels. The regular gameplay was just fine. The traditional gameplay is one of the things that make this game great. Why try to change it, if it didn't need to be changed to begin with?
Well Rovio, hopefully you have the same person who came up with these awful new levels, reading our fabulously accurate reviews, so they get the hint that it stinks??!! Furthermore, we do hope you take our reviews seriously, and do your absolute best not to flub up any more levels on a game that was great just the way it was!! ?????? ????????????? It WAS Great fun!!! AND, it WAS Fun for ALL ages too!!
I love this awesome game! The Mighty Eagle? Awesome! So for a great game, I give you 5 stars. I love the entire Angry Birds series! Keep it up!

Please fix issue for iPhone - every time I'm playing the game and a phone alarm, incoming call, text, etc pops up (which I hit the snooze or ok button) the sound then goes off the game and the only way to fix it is to reboot phone). Please help!
Had for over a year and still play it.
Chuck speeds

I love Angry Birds, but hate the new feathers levels. Definitely a step in the wrong direction, enough to make me write my first review ever in hopes that you do not continue with this version of AB. Lets just pretend this never happened and go back to our old ways, ok? Ok.
This is Gerch's favorite app. Gerch loves to see how many reindeer dragons she can fit in her park to match her favorite reindeer sweater - Love Gerch *o*
Constant pop ups trying to sell "super birds" that don't really do much take away the pleasure of the game. It is quite annoying. I think the time has come to delete my old pals A Birds. Sad.
Awsome
You want to go back to find more points.
I love this game a lot!
I love this update but change how pigs look in the other episodes
So my 5 year old plays this game and when we were at the fair he was beating pigs. And pretends like all eggs are his bloody precious and try's to strangle my wife when she makes scrambled eggs.
Great game worth the dollar
Since the last update this game crashes constantly and is unplayable. iPhone4S
I love Angry Birds. However, the reset time after the last effort is very irritating. Having to wait until the last bird poofs away gets tiresome.

What a waste of time. The tapping and aiming is so frustrating. I've gotten three stars on three levels and played all day. Very disappointed in these levels. I wish I could have given it no stars for the review. I guess I'm back to waiting for new normal levels. Thanks for raising my hopes and then crushing it with this crap

I have all the angry birds games and love new levels. This most recent update is awful. It pretends to be angry birds but it isn't. I find it frustrating to play and not fun at all. I am hoping Rovio gets the message and sticks to adding regular levels in the future.
My phone crashed and when I reinstalled everything, I no longer had the Mighty Eagle which I had already purchased. I want my eagle back!!!!
Very very good

This game is really cool. I like it and I think people will enjoy it. Make sure you check out the other Angry Birds games. (The reason my nickname is Scribblenaustin is because I really want Scribblenauts Unlimited for Christmas)
More levels?
This game is really addicting i play ot like every day, i think though this game gets way more attention than needed!
Wonderful game! Can other birds have mighty feathers?
I confirmed to update this game 5 days ago. Has just barely started installation. Wth
So,how can you come out with a game where the good guys are so weak and slow compared to the bad???
This game is amazing!!!! I am on 16-8!!! I use this game to pass time!
Ruined my favorite game. New one isnt fun at all.
Fun to spend time
Addictive! Great graphics and the physics engine is dead-on!
Good game and make bad piggies free please

This game is perfect for all you boring people out there......... It's the same on every level. Why are pigs stealing eggs??? Why are they green??? Why do birds even need a slingshot, can't they just fly anyway??? So many questions... Stupid, repetitive, boring game. Don't buy. Save your money for gameloft.
I love angry birds but this new level is really unpleasant and confusing.
Some have complaints but I think it's pretty addicting! Once the bugs were fixed it runs great and I never have a dull moment waiting in line, when I'm on break at work, or riding in the car.
Latest version totally shuts down my music when opening this to play. Fix this!
I like it but all the updates make it hard to beat
Still mono...

I love all of the games. So does my 4 yr old son. He's better than a lot of adults are. I play on my 3rd gen iPod touch. I just wish this thing could go past iOS 5. I'm always looking forward to updates tht include new levels. Keep it up Rovio!!! You guys are the kings of the gaming world!!!
Still good game and I also like the cartoons. My kids love them.
Awesome Game
It is basically a completely different game. One that is more frustrating and annoying. I really don't like the time pressure!!!
Great iPhone game.
I love this game, it's so irresistible I can't put it down!!!

The "Red's Mighty Feather" update has completely turned me off to Angry Birds. The mechanics are completely different, the strategy/problem-solving aspect is totally gone, and if your shot is so much as a pixel off from what the developers apparently intended, you essentially fail and have to restart the level.
The "Red's Mighty Feathers" levels are frustrating, poorly designed, and just not fun.
It is a fine game intill all of the ads comes and blocks the screen, and the new powerups are not smart. I bought this game to injoy a game the old fashion way, not cheep my way out of the levels
Says to update, but won't! Updated 10 other apps in one minute, but this one won't even begin updating after 5 minutes.

love the game. So much fun. But it is not fair that in Ham 'Em High , we have to log onto facebook and like you, because we paid for the app, so we should get the levels, and some of us don't have a facebook account, i paid for the app, I should get the levels. I would like you guys on facebook but i can't because i dont have a facebook account. I brought the mighty eagle on my ipod but it didn't transfer to the app on my iPhone. So buy once unlimited use is a lie.
Players who want to play would have bought it earlier.
Birdies are awesome!!!!!!!!!!!
I really like the new levels. I think it would be cool if you added a level creator where you could make levels and share them with friends.
Time just flies when your having fun.
Bird does NOT go where I tap the screen in the new levels. It seems to either lock onto a pig, or shoot horizontally no matter where I hit the screen. Not playing again without an update
not the one i know and love

Why do I have to wait so long to get past the ad for [whatever the ad is for-I refuse to pay attention to it since I paid for the app]. I might as well play a game that doesn't penalize me for playing.
The new update has a huge bug that causes some of the missions to have the targeting locked on a certain point no matter where you press. This is game breaking.
Are the best yet....love the new gameplay and goals...totally awesome. Can't wait for more levels and hopefully a boss level with King Piggy
Add icould support to the game so your purchases and records can be save so when ever you want to delete and download the game again thank you
Best game app ever! Second to none!
Seems the new ones only take speed. Accuracy is more challenging to me.

Sorry Rovio-------this new level just doesn't do it for me. Not to mention, you took the original music away! ??
Really wish there was an option to keep the original tune or not!
I waited 2 hours in order to get this app. What a rip off!!
BEST APP UPDATE EVA!!!!!!! Lol
This is the best game!!!

The new version is not good. While I like the gist of the concept, the levels get harder with the moving target and set you up at an unfair advantage. You also don't get any additional tools to gel fight the pigs and you find yourself quickly going over your quota of shots by level 6. Not worth the update.
Not enjoying the new update. +1 for trying a new idea but its not fun
I thought I paid .99 to remove ads but apparently they're back. This is completely unfair Rovio.
??Some people are so annoying they are like is boring, is this a scam?, etc. I love this game?? and why would you want the same game on more then one of your iPod, iPad, iPhone??
Love the new level! Can't stay off it! Keep up the good work.
I love it
I am having a blast with this new update! Thank you! I am a big fan!
If they were going for the "New Coke" effect it worked. It is back to real angry birds and is better then ever.

Please bring back the trajectory line or at least make it to where you can turn it on or off. That's one of the thing I loved about the game before and why it's been a while since I've played it. I have all of then except Rio. I love the fact the both Star Wars has then but not sure why you got rid of them on the original and seasons.

This is my favorite game

Dear Angry Bird team, me and and a group of people had been discussing the matter of writing to you about an idea of the same Angry Birds concept but in the Marvel super hero perception, the same as Angry Birds Star Wars but Marvel. Please take our concern. Thank you for reading.
I like angry birds cause it's cool

Angry Birds used be a fun and addicting game, and now the latest update has absolutely RUINED the game! "Red's Mighty Feathers" is WAY too difficult! I appreciate a good challenge, but this is just ridiculous! The newest levels are literally IMPOSIBLE to complete and are flat out frustrating! Do NOT download this game because Rovio has ruined the game that we've come to love, and if you have the game, don't update it! Rovio needs to fix the game and get rid of the new levels, or else they're going to lose a lot of fans and the franchise is going to fail! Not even worth one star.
Thank you for making this game so so cool LOL!!!!!!WOW!!!!!!!!
Better beans
Not compatible
It was great!!! Then it was updated and I was super excited!! The levels looked awesome!! But I can't play them, not any levels, even the ones I already beat.
I have not encountered any problems so far with this app.

Angry birds went from 5 stars to 1 star. This new level is really disappointing it is not fun, I missed the original game I'm playing it just to get over with it. I felt like I lost my interest in Angry Birds. Too bad.
Glad the designers listened to the fans.

Awesome and very addictive

Best app game ever
The new Angry Birds episode (Red's Mighty Feathers) is a piece of JUNK. It is not worth an update. If this is the kind of garbage we have to look forward to then I am done with Angry Birds.

Could be the worst thing I have seen. Great stuff usually from Angry Birds. This however does not make any sense. Hell the screen does not even move on the 1st level.
You have my money already but if other franchises come out, I will pass if this the direction you are going. Good work though if the purpose was to be completely different from other levels and giving the user no clue what the objective is.
I suggest that the next angry bird be angry birds "lord of the rings."love this game,can't stop thinking about it!!!!!!!!!!!!?????????????

Even after buying the 'full' version you still get ads for other angry birds games. And even after paying real life money to unlock the eagle, you can only use it every so often. This is a wonderful example of what is wrong with apps for iPhone in general. I got duped into giving them some money, hopefully someone in the future will be dissuaded by this. Rovio is an awful money grabbing company and knowing what I know now I will never give them another cent. I encourage all to follow suit.

I thought I loved 'Angry Birds' before the update, but the mad scientist lab is incredible. Takes me back to playing the game for the first time and it was just plain ole' fun. You guys have totally outdone yourselves with the adorable scenery and characters. More please... (PS- no offense but I was getting bored with the SW series)

I'm always looking forward to Angry Birds updates but this last one is awful. Red feathers flying around telling you what to hit-it doesn't even feel like Angry Birds anymore. Please go back to levels like in the beginning. You are ruining this super fun game!

Hey I think this game is cool but its kinda stupid cuz all you do in it is fling a bunch of little birds around. :) thts ok tho... I STILL LUVVVVV ITTTT!!!!!

It has been cutting out and restarting in the middle of my games, so that I am unable to beat high scores or get more stars. Not cool. And it restarts the game so when I try to get back to the game, it hasn't paused in the level and I have to go through the first screen again.

Awesome awesome awesome awesome!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Since I got the mighty eagle I am forced to sign in each time I play, truly annoying.
Fun really like the new levels

People are complaining about the new update of Angry Birds. It's just an ADDITION of levels to the original game with a twist, and it's NOT that bad. Sure, it's different from the previous levels, but it's unique and could get a bit challenging if you play the whole thing instead of just playing two levels and saying it's horrible. I'm sure there will be more levels of the same classic Angry Birds coming soon, so all the complainers need to take a seat and be patient. Great job on the game, Rovio! And for all who don't have the game, don't let these reviews prevent you from getting it. You don't have an iPhone/iPad/iPod Touch unless Angry Birds is on it.
P.S. I don't work for Rovio or anything, F.Y.I.
The game is fun and all but the the pop ups are awful and it notes me about cartoons! Sorry but the game is just not fun anymore.And u pay for the toons by the way.
One of my favorites.

Angry Birds rock! But the Toons are so great there should be a different app for it. I would honestly be willing to pay for an Angry Birds Toons app for one or two dollars set up exactly how it is set up on the Angry Birds app or a little different as long as it's not confusing. I love Red and Chuck. More Angry Bird Toon videos with them please. 5 stars easy!! GET THIS GAME!!! Mighty eagle rocks too.(:
the new song awful,terrible,horrible,etc.

Big complaints about it. 1) bird doesn't seem to go where I click, but rather in the general direction of the pig...extremely annoying. 2) the extremely slow speed that the birds reload. 3) at the beginning of level the extremely slow speed that I'm given control (I'm swiping to get to the bird, but no response). If the first two are fixed, then I'd give it 4 stars.

I don't see what all the hype is about. Really kind of dumb. Throw birds at buildings to kill pigs.. Nintendo has better games for casual gamers. If you want a really great game on the App Store check out infinity blade, Tiny, Tower, Warzone: Anomaly, Eufloria, or anything by Telltale Games. Kairosoft makes pretty fun and cute games, too.
I used to love this app but when ever I try to do anything it crashes and won't let me open it again
Really I don't know how this got millions of downloads I got it while it was free and I still feel ripped off.
Every time I try to play the new episode it always crashes but never the other episodes

The constant interruptions and harassment's to buy something took the fun out of the game. Recently the game would auto send me to other websites. I paid for these games, this wasn't suppose to happen....Grrr
Cool

Once, I wrote a good review for this app. I am now realizing how dumb I was. This app is like giving a dead body plastic surgery before its burial, with the surgery prolonging the burial. I can not wait until the Angry Birds fad ends. It has been around for 3+ years and all they ever add is 15 levels every three months or so to milk the franchise. END IT PLEASE! To conclude... I wish to bash all of the five-star reviewers over their heads with various pottery.
Look in the settings for Magic Places. Can't believe I just noticed it. They will track you even if the app is closed.

This is a game i will be playing when i'm old because it really is an all time classic! :) POWER TO THE BIRDS!

Just like everything else in life. You pays sometimes then it turns out free. I'm fine with that. Really.
What I DON'T like is that ridiculous Game Center garbage. I don't compete with friends. I don't need to see a leader board. I can't STAND having to go through that stupid thing every couple days to disable it when I already did that.
There should be an option to turn off Game Center permanently. Not everyone wants that.
Absolutely ridiculous. I don't mind turning it off. ONCE.
Game is awesome, addicting and plays flawlessly. Worth 6 stars but only giving one until they stop that Game Center crap.

The game crashed and deleted all my progress. The update is otherwise good -- not great. There are still tower defense levels on my phone. I hate tower defense games. And the new power of the red bird, directional targeting, kinda goes against the appeal of the original game -- you fire a bird and can't change it's direction.
More please.
Love this game.
I love this game so much!
It's a nice game, I like it very much.

Two days after installing this, found that my phone was burning 2% battery per hour just sitting there, with all background apps shutdown. Restarted phone and still was happening. As soon as I uninstalled Angry Birds, it started behaving normally again. Too bad, was a fun game.

I like the game and there always seem to be more levels than I have time to master. This game is heavily marketed to kids - fine by me, my kid loves the blankets and bath towels and t-shirts - but they've added videos to the app you can't turn off anywhere in the settings. I don't want my kid idly watching cartoons, I don't mind playing games. Give us the ability to turn off cartoons some way other than putting the iPod into airplane mode! He has learning apps that need the network, which makes this app a pain for me.
Please help on the new update every time I try and go on birds of a feather it keeps taking me out. :(
I like it.the new levels are relly fun. Still,I miss the old gameplay. You should make it mighty feathers+traditional gameplay.

It was free for 1 day! So what if you paid for it. It's only a $0.99 app. I bought this a long time ago & I'm not complaining. I think it's cool it was free for a little bit. It's a great game. It's not like they made Angry Birds Star Wars free. (If you like this game & it's your first & only angry birds. You should get Angry Birds Space.) It's almost better in my opinion. :)
Definitely a five-star addictive game, but the ads have become excessive. You pay for the game, you don't deal with ads... Just a thought

This isn't a new level, it's a totally new game. The concept is completely different and takes any fun out of Angry Birds. Change it back to the way it's been, and if Rovio really wants to keep this "level" then make a new Angry Birds game and add it to the 10 other ones. But leave the original alone!!
I can't play the new part since it keeps crashing on me, please fix it

Wft??? so many commercials is making the game slow to load and also makes it slow when playing.

Awesome update thank you this is awesome I can't wait for the next levels!!!!!!!
I'm almost out of levels!

I've been a massive Angry Birds fan for years. After finding no enjoyment in Amazing Alex or Bad Piggies, Rovio decides to force these on me in Angry Birds? For the first time since the first AB app I'm thoroughly let down. Lame move! This isn't AB. It's random garbage advertising a different game. No thank you.
Please go back to the old way, sorry but the new level are horrible!!

This is a fun game and for 99 cents is very entertaining. However, as you get further into the levels, it becomes pretty obvious that this game was written to keep you from progressing unless you spend hours doing the same pointless task until you succeed, or you pay more money to be allowed to progress with a reasonable effort. Kind of takes the entertainment out of it.

Its still loading and it has been fir five days. I want it to go away already. Please help. This is annoying even though that i like all the games but if it keeps telling me its installing and it is not thats unacceptable.
This is awesome!!!!!

I've always been a big fan of the entire Angry Birds series. However, with the most recent updates to this particular game, there is a hugely frustrating glitch. On levels with the egg dropping birds, more often than not whenever I attempt to drop an egg the icons atop the screen interfere and the result is them trying to sell me an eagle rather than dropping the egg. I've talked to others who have had the same issue. I really thought that Rovio would be above such plebeian glitches by now.
Really don't see what all the hype is about....my 6 yr old nephew thinks its pretty cool though, so I keep it on my phone ;)
really rovio?! angry birds was a great app until the update the new theme is stupid (who listens to polka!) and the "reds mighty feathers" whats up with that
Addicted and loving it!!
Love this game it's dope

I waited until I broke through #11 to rate this app. When I did succeed, I was nearly giddy with pride. After a few easy levels, I am again practicing my aim. The puzzles are fun and I am looking forward to another success Yes, I am stuck again. It is way too much fun to quit, thus still a 5 rating!

again, yet - I find that an explosion on TV gets me a little excited. That's new for me. I enjoy your creativity to find ever more and different puzzles for me. The times I out do myself give me pleasure and am excited to see what is next. Thanks! Still enjoy the black exploding birds - the finality they offer. My aim is improving with a better ratio of 3 star efforts. Thanks for the fun! You still preoccupy me happily! M I had to give one level to the eagle and have been playing lots of solitaire to help recover. Now I am ready to go back and give it another try. The ability to pick up and retry gives the game yet another 5 stars. Hi, my aim has improved as has my ability to figure out how to get 3 stars on most all levels. It is fun to get help from the characters with special powers when I am really stuck. However I do not get help unless I feel tapped out. Thanks for all the fun. Mary

Angry Birds is an overall success but I found some things that were great and others that weren't. I didn't get this app to long ago but I had played it before on another electronic device. Here is a brief recap on what you can expect if your going from tablet to apple.
The UPS
1. This version includes power ups that fire up your bird or rumble the pigs. 2. In this Angry Birds (AB) you have a new level inspired by "Bad Piggies". 3. AB is the classic fun it has always been.
The DOWNS
1. On the tablet AB is free, but Apple charges $0.99 which is kind of unfair. 2. As well, on my tablet they would give you a free "mighty eagle" everyday but Apple didn't have that. 3. This had nothing to do with this AB, but on tablet HD cost $0.99 while Apple charges $2.00.
If this is your first ever view of Angry Birds I'd say this is worth it.
Enjoy!
GREAT, on the go game to play. Any time, anywhere

Ok, so maybe the new mini game isn't a very big success, but Rovio is doing this because they're trying to appeal to a wider audience. They figured, since the game bad piggies was such a hit, they would incorporate more piggie vehicles in a fun mini game. Yes, I know, the levels for it aren't the best, and its hard as a rock to beat the last level, but its just an attempt to try something new. I'm still giving angry birds 3 stars, since my little brother loves this game so much, but please do better next time. - Lawgamer411

I loved AB. I play to improve my ranking even tho I know I'll never get to the highest score cuz of all the hacker/cheater scores. But this new version is just crap. I still play it, just not the latest v.

They miss the mark, literally. It is super frustrating because the aim is off. The bird never seems to go exactly where I want. Maybe the arrow is forcing auto aim or something but if the pig is in the middle of a contraption but there's some other weak point, like TNT then I want to aim at that.
Right now it's essentially "button mashing" throwing as many birds in as fast as possible and hoping a few hit close to the mark. Of course the delays at the start of each level aren't helping either. Let me start attacking right away, don't let the pigs have a 5 second jump on me.

You'll see many familiar faces from LOC and GS! The UI takes a little getting used to if you're used to LOC and GS. More active game play. Use my invite ID 787854195 to receive a SR card. See ya in the game!

Wouldn't sync on 4G (data worked perfectly when using other apps). All progress was gone until I came home and logged back in to my Rovio account using my wifi, which means all my progress will be gone when I'm offline (on an airplane etc). A sure downside to the cloud functionality. I've already had to start from scratch many times when I'm playing on a new device.
One more thing, the original Angry Birds theme song is so much better than the new version. Bring it back!
Update: Thank you for bringing back the original theme song! Love it! I'm upgrading you to 4 stars!
